property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Evolution - Arc Seraphim. Double Breaker When your opponent uses the "Shield Trigger" ability, search your deck for a Spell card with "Shield Trigger". Shuffle your deck. Then, you may cast that spell without paying its cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Great Mecha King. When this creature attacks, you may reveal the top 4 cards from your deck. You may add a Great Mecha King or a Machine Hero to your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of the deck in any order. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Tyranno Drake. [Fort Energy: Brave Spirit] During this turn, your opponent can't use the "Shield Trigger" ability on Shields broken by this creature. [Fort Energy: Tyranno Drake] This creature breaks an opponent's shield. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution GV - Zombie Dragon, Armored Dragon, and/or Earth Dragon. Meteorburn - When this creature attacks, you may send a creature under this card to the Graveyard. If so, put a non-Evolution 'Dragon' from your hand into play, destroy an opponent's creature with power 5000 or less, and send a card from your opponent's Mana Zone into the Graveyard. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} [Launcher E: Dragon] Search your deck, for each 'Dragon' creature in the battlezone tapped when this spell is cast, choose a creature with the same name and put it into the Battle Zone. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a Machine Hero or Great Mecha King you control is destroyed, untap all of your creatures in the Battle Zone. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an opponent draws a card, you may draw the same amount of cards. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fort Energy: Death Puppet (When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, if a Death Puppet is tapped to Summon this creature, this creature gain the following [Fort Energy] ability.) [Fort Energy] : Each player discards their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is tapped, your opponent's creature must attack if able. When your opponent's creature attacks, destroy any creature with power of 3000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Fort Energy: Wild Veggies] You may choose a creature from your Graveyard and put it into your Mana Zone. [Fort Energy: Dragon] You can return a creature from your Mana Zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Great Mecha King. [Fort Energy: Machine Hero] Tap an opponent's creature in the Battle Zone with power 3000 or less. [Fort Energy: Great Mecha King] Tap an opponent's creature in the Battle Zone with power 4000 or more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Dynamo] When this creature attacks, choose an opponent's creature in the Battle Zone and tap it. (First you choose which creature to attack, and then you choose which creature to tap.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Evolution - Grand Devil. [Fort Energy: Deep Marine] Choose a creature in the Battle Zone and return it to owner's hand. [Fort Energy: Grand Devil] Choose a player. That player shuffles his/her hand into their deck, and draws the same number of cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature cannot be attacked. This creature cannot be blocked. This creature cannot attack creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} [Launcher E: Great Mecha King] Reveal double the amount of tapped Great Mecha King cards from your deck when casting this spell. From there add all Great Mecha King to your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, choose one of your Shields and add it to your hand. However, any "Shield Trigger" abilities on that card cannot be used. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When any creature or Cross Gear is put into the Battle Zone, or Spell is played, and cards in the Mana Zone are not tapped, the controller of that card chooses and destroys a creature in his/her Battle Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} [Launcher E: Grand Devil] For each Grand Devil tapped when this spell is played, choose an opponent's Shield and add it to his/her hand. (Your opponent may use "Shield Trigger" abilities from the returned cards).

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Fort Energy: Dragon] Until the end of turn, all creatures in your Battle Zone gain power +3000. [Fort Energy: Human] Destroy a creature with power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dynamo (When another Dynamo attacks or is attacked, you may tap this creature. If you do, add this creature's power and abilities to that creature until the end of turn). When this creature attacks a player and is not blocked, destroy an opponent's creature with power 3000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed Attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) This creature must attack each turn if able. When a Tyranno Drake or Brave Spirit you control attacks, destroy an opponent's creature with "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Dreammate. When an opponent casts a Spell, look at your deck. Select a Dreammate, reveal it and put it in your hand. Shuffle the deck. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creatures is put into the Battle Zone, choose a card in an opponent's Mana Zone, and put it in its owner's Graveyard. Afterward, put the top card from your deck into your Mana Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put up to three creatures from your Graveyard into your Mana Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] [Fort Energy: Great Mecha King] Choose two Shields and reveal them. (The chosen shields stay revealed in the Shield Zone.) This creature cannot attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a Great Mecha King you control wins a battle, you may tap this creature. If so, untap the winning Great Mecha King.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} [Launcher E: Arc Seraphim] Search your deck for the same number of Spells as Arc Seraphim you tapped when this Spell was cast. Reveal them to your opponent, and put them in your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fort Energy: Liquid People (When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, if a Liquid People is tapped to Summon this creature, this creature gain the following [Fort Energy] ability.) [Fort Energy] : Each player draw cards equal to the number of creatures in their Battle Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] This creature cannot attack. All creatures that would destroyed by this creature in battle are not destroyed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] This creature cannot attack. When an opponent's creature blocks your attack, you may untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When another creature is put into your Battle Zone, destroy this creature. When a card is put into a Mana Zone, send it to the Graveyard instead. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks a creature, destroy that creature. When this creature is attacked, destroy this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Destroy an opponent's creature with cost equal to or less than the number of cards in your Graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your Dreammate wins a battle, one of your creatures in the Battle Zone gains "Speed Attacker" and "Double Breaker" until the end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature must attack each turn if able. When this creature is tapped, Spells cannot be played.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} [Launcher E: Tyranno Drake] Destroy a creature with power equal to or less than the total power of the Tyranno Drakes tapped while casting this Spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the Battle Zone and moves it to their Mana Zone. When this creature is destroyed, your opponent chooses one of their non-Evolution creatures in their Mana Zone and moves it to their Battle Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Choose a creature Type. Until the end of this turn, all creatures in the Battle Zone you control have that creature Type.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a Great Mecha King or Vehicle Bee is put into your Battle Zone, destroy this creature at the end of that turn. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, tap an opponent's creature in the Battle Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gains Power +2000 for each creature Type an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Saver: Great Mecha King (When one of your Great Mecha King is destroyed, this creature is destroyed instead.)

card.name: Ra Bool, Guardian of White Gold

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.) This creature cannot block creatures with power 2000 or less. This creature cannot attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Grand Devil you control wins a battle, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] This creature cannot attack. When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, choose one of your creatures in the Battle Zone and return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add one card to your hand, put one on the bottom of your deck, and put the last one on the top of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.) This creature can't attack. When this creature blocks, your opponent chooses a card in his/her hand and discards it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a Tyranno Drake you control wins a battle, you may return a creature from your Graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Slayer (When this creature loses a battle, destroy the other creature.) When this creature is destroyed, discard a card from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Fort Energy: Brave Spirit] Until the end of this turn, all Tyranno Drake you control in the Battle Zone gain "Speed Attacker" and "This creature must attack if able".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature battles a creature with "Blocker", this creature gains Power +4000.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature may only attack if a Tyranno Drake you control has attacked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy an opponent's creature with power 2000 or less. One of your creatures in the Battle Zone gains "Power Attacker +2000" until the end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fort Energy: Arc Seraphim (When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, if a Arc Seraphim is tapped to Summon this creature, this creature gain the following [Fort Energy] ability.) [Fort Energy] : Put a "Spirit Rider Zafal Banikis" from your Mana Zone into the Battle Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a Arc Seraphim you control wins a Battle, put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your Mana Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a Wild Veggies you control is put into the Mana Zone, this creature gains Power +2000 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} [Launcher E: Dreammate] For each Dreammate tapped when this Spell is cast, put the top card from your deck into your Mana Zone.
